text: Hello people, please help me out of this doubt, when a customer buys a theme, he edits on the page that is created or on the template? If it is the second one, does it mean that to make it look as close as possible to the page when the customer is going to edit on the template, it is necessary to modify each module from the template in code so that it looks like the page? thanks.

I did exactly the same as you described - the only tricky thing is syncing the websites themselves from one account to another. I was told you have to use CLI. All other stuff (modules, templates, files) can be copied/downloaded from within the web interface (Design Manager/Filemanager). Since I just had 6 Pages to migrate I copied them manually (refilled the templates with the content). Was pretty painless and done within an hour...
